id.description: The unique identifier for each institution

region.description: The geographical region where the institution is located

name.description: The name of the higher education institution

category.description: The category of the institution, such as university, college, etc.

value_dict.Private: The institution is privately owned and operated.
value_dict.Public: The institution is publicly owned and operated.

url.description: The website URL of the institution

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in analyzing higher education institutions data.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the higher education institution, please predict whether the institution is privately or publicly owned.

class_value_dict.Private: The institution is privately owned and operated.
class_value_dict.Public: The institution is publicly owned and operated.
